argument.description: Is the object to be used. object_name is either varchar or nvarchar. If object_name is varchar, it is implicitly converted to nvarchar. Specifying the database and schema names is optional.

Is the schema-scoped object type. object_type is either varchar or nvarchar. If object_type is varchar, it is implicitly converted to nvarchar. For a list of object types, see the type column in sys.objects (Transact-SQL).

description: Returns the database object identification number of a schema-scoped object.
